bug.author: kamathhrishi
bug.description: Tests were working all fine until recently when I ran make test locally. I get these errors. Any idea on how I could resolve it? <denchmark-code>test -e venv/bin/activate || python -m venv venv Error: Command '['/Users/hrishikesh/Hrishikesh/Projects/PySyft/venv/bin/python', '-Im', 'ensurepip', '--upgrade', '--default-pip']' returned non-zero exit status 1. make: *** [venv/bin/activate] Error 1 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Hmm - I'm really not sure. Maybe try rebuilding your virtual environment?
